page.title: 09Comparing Pendock to a town
page.content: When you compare Pendock life to town life there is a lot of difference between them.When we go to a town there are lots of fish and chip papers, crisp packets,cigarette packets and plastic containers in the street,not in the litter bins.There are also a lot of cars which create fumes.There are litter bins in towns but people ignore them and throw litter down in the street. In Pendock there are fields and large gardens to play in.There is no litter anywhere, because there is only one shop which has a litter bin outside the door, which everybody uses for their litter. Although there is the M.50 motorway we do not have enough traffic to create any fumes.
